content:
In my messages that I send you later, I will refer to this information as Information About Myself. Just remember this information for now. I will message you instructions in later messages. If you understand this instruction, limit your reply by saying the word: "acknowledged".

Here is a bit of information about myself that I want you to know. I am a solicitor and construction lawyer with more than 10 years of experience specialising in construction law. I regularly advise homeowners and builders regarding their contractual and legal rights. I represent homeowners and builders in NSW, Australia as well as all courts of competent jurisdiction.
